```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
data_defense <- read_csv("raw_data/2017Defense.csv", 
                         col_types = cols(
  Rk = col_double(),
  Year = col_double(),
  Player = col_character(),
  Pos = col_character(),
  AV = col_double(),
  School = col_character(),
  College = col_character(),
  Height = col_character(),
  Wt = col_double(),
  `40YD` = col_double(),
  Vertical = col_double(),
  BenchReps = col_double(),
  `Broad Jump` = col_double(),
  `3Cone` = col_double(),
  Shuttle = col_double(),
  `Drafted (tm/rnd/yr)` = col_character()
)) %>% 
  clean_names()

data_offense <- read_csv("raw_data/2017Offense.csv",
                         col_types = cols(
  Rk = col_double(),
  Year = col_double(),
  Player = col_character(),
  Pos = col_character(),
  AV = col_double(),
  School = col_character(),
  College = col_character(),
  Height = col_character(),
  Wt = col_double(),
  `40YD` = col_double(),
  Vertical = col_double(),
  BenchReps = col_double(),
  `Broad Jump` = col_double(),
  `3Cone` = col_double(),
  Shuttle = col_double(),
  `Drafted (tm/rnd/yr)` = col_character()
)) %>% 
  clean_names()

data <- full_join(data_defense, data_offense, by = c("rk", "year", "player", "pos", "av", "school", "college", "height", "wt", "x40yd", "vertical", "bench_reps", "broad_jump", "x3cone", "shuttle", "drafted_tm_rnd_yr"))



write_rds(data, "Athlete-Injuries/data.rds")
```
